extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    A min GPA of 2.0 in BIOL 102/3.0 & BIOL 103/3.0, or permission of the instructor.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from IDIS150/6.0; KNPE125/3.0; KNPE225/3.0; PHGY210/6.0; PHGY212/6.0; PHGY214/6.0

basic.description:
The function of organs, body systems, and the integration of functions in the whole body.
NOTE    Students in a KINE, HLTH, PHED or NURS Plan should not register in this course.
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Mammalian Physiology
